Terrorsaur:


Terrorsaur frowned and walked off, kicking at a pebble in his 
path. "Tin tyrant," he mumbled lowly. He didn't take his good news of 
winning two battles into comment for himself.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> OOC: Megatron is back at the Predacon Cave.
> 
>     Megatron glares at Terrorsaur, "Where was I? You imputent 
little winged 
> lizard! As if you are the commander and I am your minion! Cross 
that boundry 
> agian and you will be a red scrap pile, got it?!?!"
>     He then turns to the others. "Well done on the defence while I 
was away. 
> I should inform you all that we will be moving up in the world. 
Moving right 
> up into the Armada."
